abstract: British authorities have started criminal proceedings against 10 current and former employees of Barclays and Deutsche Bank, charging them with manipulating Euribor global interest rate.
lead_paragraph: The proceedings are the first in Britain related to the euro interbank offered rate, or Euribor.

headline.main: British Authorities Accuse 10 of Rigging Benchmark Interest Rate
headline.print_headline: British Authorities Accuse 10 of Rigging a Benchmark Interest Rate

snippet: The proceedings are the first in Britain related to the euro interbank offered rate, or Euribor.
